name: キャプテンセイバー
summary: Power Blade 2, known in Japan as Captain Saver (キャプテンセイバー Kyaputen Seibā), is an action platform video game developed by Natsume and published by Taito for the Nintendo Entertainment System/Family Computer. It was released in North America in October 1992 and in Japan on September 29, 1992. It is the sequel to the game Power Blade.
info:
• 中文名: 力量刀锋2
  • 开发: ナツメ
  • 发行: Taito
  • 别名: Captain Saver
  • 别名: Power Blade 2
  • 别名: 能源战士2
